# Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP) for Spectrometric Probe

## Notice Details

*   **Reference Number**: cb-35-6563846
*   **Amendment Number**: 3
*   **Solicitation Number**: 5000078998
*   **Publication Date**: 2024-01-16
*   **Tender Closing Date and Time**: 2024-01-31T14:00:00
*   **Amendment Date**: 2024-01-31
*   **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2024-02-01
*   **Expected Contract End Date**: 2024-03-31
*   **Tender Status**: Expired

## Tender Information

*   **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services
*   **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP) against Supply Arrangement
*   **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Traditional
*   **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
*   **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   **Regions of Opportunity**: Canada
*   **Regions of Delivery**: Canada

## Vendor Contact Information

*   **Vendor Name**: Natural Resources Canada
*   **Vendor Address**: 580 Booth Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0E4, Canada
*   **Vendor Contact Person**: Nadine Gudbranson, nadine.gudbranson@nrcan-rncan.gc.ca, 343-543-7068

## Tender Description

Natural Resources Canada requires a spectrometric probe for optical measurement of absorbance spectra in water, online and in-situ, capable of monitoring various parameters simultaneously.

## Tender Document

The tender document is available for download at the following URL: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/29549/npp-5000078998---e60pv-19equi-%28en-fr.pdf
